text: septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with ktp laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally
context: operations performed: septoplasty with partial inferior middle turbinectomy with ktp laser, sinus endoscopy with maxillary antrostomies, removal of tissue, with septoplasty and partial ethmoidectomy bilaterally.

text: chronic sinusitis with deviated nasal septum and nasal obstruction and hypertrophied turbinates
context: operative diagnoses: chronic sinusitis with deviated nasal septum and nasal obstruction and hypertrophied turbinates.

text: the patient was taken to the operating room
context: the patient was taken to the operating room.
after adequate anesthesia via endotracheal intubation, the nose was prepped with afrin nasal spray.
after this was done, 1% xylocaine with 100,000 epinephrine was infiltrated in both sides of the septum and the mucoperichondrium.
the sinus endoscope at 25-degrees was then used to examine the nasal cavity in the left nasal cavity and staying lateral to the middle turbinate.
this was then opened with 45-degree forceps.
there was some prominent tissue and just superior to this, the anterior ethmoid was opened.
there was some prominent tissue and just superior to this, the anterior ethmoid was opened.
the maxillary sinus ostium was then opened with 45-degree forceps.

text: tissue found in the ethmoid and maxillary sinus
context: the tissue found in the ethmoid and maxillary sinus were removed and sent to pathology and labeled as left maxillary sinus mucosa.
the tissue found in the ethmoid and maxillary sinus were removed and sent to pathology and labeled as left maxillary sinus mucosa.
there was noted to have prominence in the anterior ethmoidal area.

text: mucosa was then removed from the anterior area
context: this mucosa was then removed from the anterior area.

text: tissue was removed from this area
context: tissue was removed from this area.
this was sent as right maxillary mucosa.
the backbiting rongeur was then used to open up the ostium and enlarge the ostium on the right maxillary sinus.

protecting the eyes with wet gauze and using ktp laser at 10 watts, the sinus endoscope was used for observation and the submucosal resection was done of both inferior turbinates as well as anterior portion of the middle turbinates bilaterally.

after this was completed, a septoplasty was performed.

text: incision was made with a #15 blade bard-parker knife
context: the incision was made with a #15 blade bard-parker knife.
the flap was then elevated, overlying the spur that was protruding into the right nasal cavity.

text: spur that was protruding into the right nasal cavity

text: tissue was then laid back in position

text: nasal cavity was irrigated with saline solution
context: the nasal cavity was irrigated with saline solution, suctioned well as well as the oropharynx.
surgicel with antibiotic ointment was placed in each nostril and sutured outside the nose with 3-0 nylon.
